name: afternet-testnet-integration
description: Integration tests for Afternet IRC testnet

scripts.test:multiserver: npm run infra:linked && vitest run src/ircv3/multiserver.test.ts
scripts.test:p10: npm run infra:linked && vitest run src/ircv3/p10*.test.ts
scripts.infra:multi: cd .. && docker compose --profile linked --profile multi up -d --wait
scripts.infra:down: cd .. && docker compose --profile linked --profile multi down
